member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Data.StaticPathEdge
member.summary: Define an edge connecting two street vertices. It is called "static", because it precalculates a couple of measurements, assuming that the vertex positions are not changed. This optimizes the process for many procedures.

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.StaticPathEdge.CalculateIntersection(Sceelix.Paths.Data.StaticPathEdge,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Introduces a new vertex into the street and returns the 2 new static street edges

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEdge
member.summary: Defines a straight connection between 2 street vertices

member.name: P:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEdge.Direction
member.summary: Vector indicating the direction of the pathedge, already normalized.

member.name: P:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEdge.Marked
member.summary: Just a standard boolean flag that may help in several algorithms.

member.name: P:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEdge.Vertices
member.summary: An enumeration of the edge's two vertices: source and target.

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEdge.CoincidentWith(Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEdge)
member.summary: Indicates if the given edge is coincident with this edge, i.e. if they somehow connect the same two vertices.
member.param: Edge to compare to.
member.returns: True if the two edges connect the same two vertices, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEdge.Connects(Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathVertex,Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathVertex)
member.summary: Indicates if this edge somehow connects the given two vertices (i.e. any of them being the source and the other the target).
member.param: The first vertex.
The second vertex.
member.returns: True if the two vertices are connected by this edge, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEdge.GetDirectionFrom(Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathVertex)
member.summary: Determines the vector direction when starting from the given vertex.
member.param: Vertex where to start from (it assumes that the given vertex is one the edge's vertices).

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEdge.HasPointInBetween(Sceelix.Mathematics.Data.Vector3D)
member.summary: Indicates if the given position lies on this edge.
member.param: Position in 3D world to verify.
member.returns: True if the position lies on this edge, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEdge.IntroduceVertex(Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathVertex)
member.summary: Introduces the new vertex in the edge, i.e. connects the source and target of this edge to this new vertex and returns two new edges, with the same attributes. The edge detaches itself from the vertices it was attached to. Important: If this is used for edges existing within an already created PathEntity, this edge should be removed and the newly created ones added.
member.param: Vertex in the middle to connect to.
member.returns: Two new edges: one connecting source to the new vertex, and another connecting the new vertex to the new vertex.

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEdge.ReplaceVertex(Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathVertex,Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathVertex)
member.summary: Replaced the given vertex with a second one.
member.param: Vertex to be replaced. It should be either the source or target vertex of this edge. If not, nothing will happen.
Vertex to replace the vertex with.

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity.#ctor(Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEdge[])
member.summary: Creates a path from a given set of edges.
member.param: Edges from which the path should be created.

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEdge})
member.summary: Creates a path from a given set of edges.
member.param: Edges from which the path should be created.

member.name: P:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity.BoundingBox
member.summary: Calculates and returns a boundingbox with this entity's extent.

member.name: P:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity.BoxScope
member.summary: Box Scope that defines the size, orientation and

member.name: P:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity.Edges
member.summary: Edges of this path.

member.name: P:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity.Vertices
member.summary: Enumeration of vertices in this path (obtained from traversing the edges).

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity.AddEdge(Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEdge)
member.summary: Adds an edge to the path and updates the scope.
member.param: Edge to be added.

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity.AddEdges(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEdge})
member.summary: Adds a set of edges to the path and updates the scope.
member.param: Edges to be added.

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity.AddEdges(Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEdge[])
member.summary: Adds a set of edges to the path and updates the scope.
member.param: Edges to be added.

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity.AdjustScope
member.summary: Maintains the orientation and recalculates the translation and sizes so that it encompasses the Entity.

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity.AdjustScope(Sceelix.Mathematics.Data.BoxScope)
member.summary: Maintains the orientation of the parent and recalculates the translation and sizes so that it encompasses the current Entity.

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity.CleanConnections
member.summary: Removes possible links/references to edges that may not be part of this path.

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity.CreateSequence(Sceelix.Mathematics.Data.Vector3D[])
member.summary: Creates a path from a given set of positions, which are turned into vertices. Builds edges connecting them in the sequence that was given.
member.param: Vertices from which the path should be created.

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity.CreateSequence(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Sceelix.Mathematics.Data.Vector3D})
member.summary: Creates a path from a given set of positions, which are turned into vertices. Builds edges connecting them in the sequence that was given.
member.param: Vertices from which the path should be created.

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity.CreateSequence(Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathVertex[])
member.summary: Creates a path from a given set of vertices. Builds edges connecting them in the sequence that was given.
member.param: Vertices from which the path should be created.

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity.CreateSequence(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathVertex})
member.summary: Creates a path from a given set of vertices. Builds edges connecting them in the sequence that was given.
member.param: Vertices from which the path should be created.

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Gets the enumerator of path edges.

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity.InsertInto(Sceelix.Mathematics.Data.BoxScope)
member.summary: Transforms this entity to that it fits the given boxscope.
member.param: Scope where to move the entity to.

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity.IntroduceVertex(Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEdge,Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathVertex)
member.summary: Creates a new vertex where an edge was standing. Removes that edge and connects its source and target to the new vertex with two new edges. Uses the IntroduceVertex function from the pathedge, but already adds and respective removes the edges internally.
member.param: Edges to be replaced.
Vertex in the middle to connect to.
member.returns: Two new edges: one connecting source to the new vertex, and another connecting the new vertex to the new vertex.

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity.RemoveEdge(Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEdge,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Removes the given edge from the path (and detaches it from its vertices).
member.param: Edge to be removed.
Indicates if the boxscope should be readjusted after the removal (see AdjustScope function).

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity.RemoveEdges(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEdge},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Removes the given edges from the path.
member.param: Edges to be removed.
Indicates if the boxscope should be readjusted after the removal (see AdjustScope function).

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity.RemoveVertex(Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathVertex,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Removes the give vertex from the path.
member.param: Vertex to be removed.
Indicates if the previously connected vertices should be connected among them.
Indicates if the boxscope should be readjusted after the removal (see AdjustScope function).

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity.RemoveVertices(System.Collections.Generic.List{Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathVertex},System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Removes the given vertices from the path.
member.param: Vertices to be removed.
Indicates if the previously connected vertices should be connected among them.
Indicates if the boxscope should be readjusted after the removal (see AdjustScope function).

member.name: P:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathVertex.Degree
member.summary: Number of edges connected to this vertex.

member.name: P:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathVertex.InDegree
member.summary: Number of edges that arrive at this vertex (i.e. their Target is this vertex)

member.name: P:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathVertex.IngoingEdges
member.summary: Edges that arrive at this vertex (i.e. their Target is this vertex).

member.name: P:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathVertex.OutDegree
member.summary: Number of edges that depart from this vertex (i.e. their Source is this vertex)

member.name: P:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathVertex.OutgoingEdges
member.summary: Edges that depart from this vertex (i.e. their Source is this vertex)

member.name: P:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathVertex.Position
member.summary: 3D coordinate of the vertex

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathVertex.CleanConnections(System.Collections.Generic.HashSet{Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEdge})
member.summary: Removes references to edges that are not in the indicated hashset of edges.
member.param: The edges.

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathVertex.GetOrderedEdges(Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEdge,Sceelix.Mathematics.Data.Vector3D)
member.summary: Gets the edges, ordered clockwise by angle, relative to the given firstEdge, around the given normal.
member.param: The first edge. Must be connected to this vertex!
The normal around which to rotate.

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Helpers.PathEntityHelper.Blend(Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity)
member.summary: Blends edges and vertices within paths. Intersecting edges result in shared vertices. Overlapping vertices are joined.

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Helpers.PathEntityHelper.Round(Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity,System.Int32)
member.summary: Rounds the coordinate values of the path vertices, reducing possible mathematical errors in floating point values.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.MeshOnSurfacePainting
member.summary: Paints mesh faces on the surface.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.MeshOnSurfacePainting._inputMesh
member.summary: The meshes that are to be painted on the terrain.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.MeshOnSurfacePainting._outputMesh
member.summary: The meshes that were painted on the terrain.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.MeshOnSurfacePainting._parameterValue
member.summary: The intensity of the texture painting.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.PathSeparateParameter
member.summary: Separation options.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.PathSeparateParameter._parameterAttributes
member.summary: Defines what the attributes of the individual path entities should be: if they should take the attributes of the parent, use the ones of the edge or mix both.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.PathSeparateParameter._parameterScope
member.summary: Defines how the 3D Scope of the individual path entities should be: if they should inherit from the parent path or assume new ones, adjusted to the orientation of the edge.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.PathOnSurfaceAdjustParameter
member.summary: Adjusts the surface around paths.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.PathOnSurfaceAdjustParameter._input
member.summary: Path entities around which the surface should be adjusted.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.PathOnSurfaceAdjustParameter._output
member.summary: Path entities around which the surface was adjusted.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.PathOnSurfaceAdjustParameter._parameterWidth
member.summary: The distance around the path that should be adjusted. This value can be set as an expression based on edge properties. The @@attributeName will refer to the attributes of each edge.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.PathOnSurfacePainting
member.summary: Paints paths on the surface.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.PathOnSurfacePainting._inputPath
member.summary: The paths that are to be painted on the terrain.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.PathOnSurfacePainting._outputPath
member.summary: The paths that were painted on the terrain.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.PathOnSurfacePainting._parameterWidth
member.summary: The distance around the path that should be painted. This value can be set as an expression based on edge properties. The @@attributeName will refer to the attributes of each edge.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.PathOnSurfacePainting._parameterValue
member.summary: The intensity of the texture painting.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.PathPropertyParameter
member.summary: Reads/calculates properties from path entities.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.PathPropertyParameter._input
member.summary: Path entity from which to read the properties.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.PathPropertyParameter._output
member.summary: Path entity from which the properties were read.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.PathPropertyParameter._parameterEdgeCount
member.summary: Number of edges in the path.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.PathPropertyParameter._parameterLength
member.summary: Total length (sum of all edge sizes) of the path.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.PathPropertyParameter._parameterVertexCount
member.summary: Number of vertices in the path.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.MeshFromPathParameter
member.summary: Creates a mesh from a path entity.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.MeshFromPathParameter.AngleTolerance
member.summary: Defines the +/- angle to add to the 180ยบ special case

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.MeshFromPathParameter._input
member.summary: Path entity to be transformed into a mesh.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.MeshFromPathParameter._parameterCloseInsides
member.summary: Indicates if the insides of the closed paths should be transformed into faces.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.MeshFromPathParameter._parameterWidth
member.summary: The width of the face created for each edge. Can be set as an expression based on the attributes of each edge using the @@attributeName notation.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.MeshFromPathParameter._attributeSectionType
member.summary: Attribute that will store the name the name of the section in the face. Values can be "Inside", "Joint" or "Path" and can be extracted with a "Mesh Subselect" node.

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.MeshFromPathParameter.CloseInsideAreas(System.Collections.Generic.List{Sceelix.Meshes.Data.Face})
member.summary: Closes the "holes" between the faces

member.summary: Function used in a ordering function to determine the angle around a vertex (and a given axis normal).
member.returns: The angle between that edge and the first edge direction.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.PathPlacementParameter
member.summary: Places paths on the surface.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.PathPlacementParameter._input
member.summary: Paths to be placed on the surface.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Parameters.PathPlacementParameter._output
member.summary: Paths that were placed on the surface.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathDivideProcedure
member.summary: Divides paths into subpaths according to specific criteria.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathDivideProcedure._input
member.summary: The path to be divided.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathDivideProcedure._output
member.summary: The divided paths, according to the defined groups.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathDivideProcedure._parameterDivideGroups
member.summary: Criteria by which the path should be divided. If none is indicated, the whole set of edges will be considered.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathDivideProcedure._parameterSeparate
member.summary: If true, each one of the edges of the path will be placed into a separate path entity.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathDivideProcedure.PathDivideAttributeSetParameter
member.summary: Divides the paths by attribute value, i.e. building sets of edges that share the same value.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathDivideProcedure.PathDivideAttributeSetParameter._parameterValue
member.summary: Value to divide the paths by.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathDivideProcedure.PathDivideDirectionSetParameter
member.summary: Divides the paths into sets of edges that share the same (approximate) normal direction.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathDivideProcedure.PathDivideAdjacencySetParameter
member.summary: Divides the paths by their vertex connections.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathDivideProcedure.PathDivideSizeParameter
member.summary: Divides the paths by number of edges or vertices, so that they don't exceed the requested size.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathDivideProcedure.PathDivideSizeParameter._parameterType
member.summary:
Type of element to divide by:
Edges means that the paths will not exceed the indicated edge count.
Vertices means that the paths will not exceed the indicated vertex count.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathDivideProcedure.PathDivideSizeParameter._parameterCount
member.summary: The maximum allowed count of edges or vertices to keep in each resulting path.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathSubselectProcedure
member.summary: Selects a subset of edges from a given path creating new paths.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathSubselectProcedure._input
member.summary: The path which to apply the subselection to.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathSubselectProcedure._parameterPathSelection
member.summary: The edge selections to apply.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathSubselectProcedure.PathSelectionParameter.Output
member.summary: The path resulting from the edges that matched the respective selection.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathSubselectProcedure.PathSelectionParameter.ParameterSeparate
member.summary: if true, each one of the edges of the path will be placed into a separate path entity.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathSubselectProcedure.IndexSelectionParameter
member.summary: Selects edges from the path by their index.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathSubselectProcedure.IndexSelectionParameter.ParameterIndex
member.summary: Index of the edge to select.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathSubselectProcedure.CustomSelectionParameter
member.summary: Selects edges by a custom condition.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathSubselectProcedure.CustomSelectionParameter._parameterCondition
member.summary: Condition to evaluate for each edge. If true, the edge will be included in the resulting path. Can access the attributes of each edge using the @@attributeName notation.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathSubselectProcedure.AllSelectionParameter
member.summary: Selects all (remaining) edges.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathSubselectProcedure.DirectionSelectionParameter
member.summary: Selects edges based on the direction of their normals.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathSubselectProcedure.DirectionSelectionParameter._parameterDirectionSelection
member.summary: The direction of the edges.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathSubselectProcedure.DirectionSelectionParameter._parameterAngleTolerance
member.summary: The angle tolerance which will be used for the comparison.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathSubselectProcedure.DirectionSelectionParameter._parameterRelativeTo
member.summary: Indicates if the direction to compare to will be relative to the scope or the world.

member.summary: Decomposes a Path into vertices or edges, all without destroying the links between the path parts.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathDecomposeProcedure._input
member.summary: Path to be decomposed.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathDecomposeProcedure._output
member.summary: Path subentities (according to the selected "Entity Type" parameter).

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathDecomposeProcedure._outputOriginal
member.summary: The original path.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathDecomposeProcedure._parameterSubEntities
member.summary: The type of entities into which the path should be decomposed.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathCreateProcedure
member.summary: Creates Paths of primitive patterns (grid, voronoi) or from other Entity types.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathCreateProcedure._output
member.summary: Path created according to the defined parameters and/or inputs.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathCreateProcedure._parameterPrimitive
member.summary: Type of path pattern/method to create.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathCreateProcedure.CreateSinglePathParameter
member.summary: Creates a path from a sequence of points.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathCreateProcedure.CreateSinglePathParameter.Points
member.summary: List of points that define the path.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathCreateProcedure.CreateGridPathParameter
member.summary: Creates a path network with a grid shape.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathCreateProcedure.CreateGridPathParameter._parameterColumns
member.summary: Number of points in the X direction.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathCreateProcedure.CreateGridPathParameter._parameterRows
member.summary: Number of points in the Y direction.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathCreateProcedure.CreateGridPathParameter._parameterColumnWidth
member.summary: Spacing between column points (in X).

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathCreateProcedure.CreateGridPathParameter._parameterRowHeight
member.summary: Spacing between row points (in Y).

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathCreateProcedure.CreateVoronoiPathParameter
member.summary: Creates a path network with a cellular appearance using the Voronoi algorithm.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathCreateProcedure.CreateVoronoiPathParameter._heightParameter
member.summary: Height (size in Y) of the path network.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathCreateProcedure.CreateVoronoiPathParameter._widthParameter
member.summary: Width (size in X) of the path network.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathCreateProcedure.CreateVoronoiPathParameter._spacingParameter
member.summary: Average spacing between the path intersections.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathCreateProcedure.CreateVoronoiPathParameter._maxOffsetParameter
member.summary: Maximum offset of each path intersection. A value of 0 will result in a grid-like appearance.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathCreateProcedure.CreateVoronoiPathParameter._seedParameter
member.summary: Seed that defines the randomness of the path.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathCreateProcedure.CreateFromMeshParameter
member.summary: Creates a path from the given mesh edges.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathCreateProcedure.CreateFromMeshParameter._input
member.summary: Mesh whose edges are to be extracted.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathMergeProcedure
member.summary: Merges several paths into a single one.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathMergeProcedure._input
member.summary:
The type of input port.
Setting a Single (square) input means that the node will be executed once for all paths. Useful to merge any collection of paths at once.
Setting a Dual (circles) input means that the node will be executed once for each pair of paths. Useful to merge exactly two paths at once.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathMergeProcedure._output
member.summary: The merged paths, according to the defined criteria.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathMergeProcedure._parameterCriteria
member.summary: Criteria on which to group the paths. If none is defined, all the paths will be merged into one.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathMergeProcedure._parameterScopeMerge
member.summary:
How the scope for the merged paths should be defined.
First: The scope from the first path will be selected and adapted to the new mesh size.
Reset: The scope will be reset, meaning that it will be aligned to the world axes.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathModifyProcedure
member.summary: Applies sequences of transformations to the given input path.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathModifyProcedure._parameterOperation
member.summary: The operation to be applied to the mesh.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathModifyProcedure.IncreasePrecisionParameter
member.summary: Increases the number of vertices in which the path is divided.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathModifyProcedure.IncreasePrecisionParameter._parameterMaxSize
member.summary: The maximum size of each one of the path segments.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathModifyProcedure.SimplifyParameter
member.summary: Simplifies paths by removing vertices which do not introduce a noticeable detail. Only affects vertices shared by two and only two edges.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathModifyProcedure.SimplifyParameter._parameterAngleTolerance
member.summary: The angle tolerance, in degrees. Vertices whose edge angles differ less than this value from 180 degrees (meaning that they are rather straight) are removed.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathModifyProcedure.SmoothParameter
member.summary: Smooths a path by introducing more vertices following a bezier function.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathModifyProcedure.SmoothParameter._parameterSmoothSteps
member.summary: The number of smoothing steps to use. The higher, the smoother it can look.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathModifyProcedure.SmoothParameter._parameterBend
member.summary: The intensity of the smoothing.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathModifyProcedure.RoundVerticesParameter
member.summary: Rounds the coordinate values of the path vertices, reducing possible mathematical errors in floating point values.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathModifyProcedure.RoundVerticesParameter._parameterPrecision
member.summary: Number of decimal cases to which the values should be rounded to.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathModifyProcedure.BlendParameter
member.summary: Blends edges and vertices within paths. Intersecting edges result in shared vertices. Overlapping vertices are joined.

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathModifyProcedure.BlendParameter.FindEdgeIntersections(Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity)
member.summary: Step 1

member.name: M:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathModifyProcedure.BlendParameter.FixComplementaryEdges(Sceelix.Paths.Data.PathEntity)
member.summary: Step 3

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathModifyProcedure.CleanupParameter
member.summary: Performs path cleaning by grouping/merging vertices that are closer than a specified range. This avoids possible issues when, for instance, transforming the path into a mesh.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathModifyProcedure.CleanupParameter._parameterDistance
member.summary: Maximum distance between vertices allowed before a merge between them will take place. (Entity Expression reads values from individual vertices)

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathModifyProcedure.CleanupParameter._parameterCrossOnly
member.summary: Indicates if the cleanup should only apply to path crossings (i.e. vertices with more than 2 edges)

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathModifyProcedure.EdgeCleanupParameter
member.summary: Performs edge cleanup by merging edges that are too close together.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathModifyProcedure.EdgeCleanupParameter._parameterWidth
member.summary: Expected size around the edge that must be kept clean. Half of this size is used for each side of the edge. Evaluated per path edge.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathModifyProcedure.EdgeCleanupParameter._parameterAngleTolerance
member.summary: Minimum angle tolerance (in degrees) between edges in order for them to be included in the cleanup. This value should only be lowered if very small angles are known to exist, otherwise it could result in mathematical precision problems.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathModifyProcedure.TrimParameter
member.summary: Trims the paths leaf edges, i.e. those edges that contain non-shared vertices, by a certain amount.

member.name: F:Sceelix.Paths.Procedures.PathModifyProcedure.TrimParameter._parameterAmount
member.summary: The amount to cut on the leaf edges.

member.name: T:Sceelix.Paths.Algorithms.Voronoi
member.summary: Description of Voronoi.
